description: Adds a CloudWatch log stream to monitor application configuration errors. For more information about using CloudWatch log streams with Amazon Kinesis Analytics applications, see Working with Amazon CloudWatch Logs.

parameters.name: CurrentApplicationVersionId
parameters.description: The version ID of the Kinesis Analytics application.

parameters.name: CloudWatchLoggingOption
parameters.description: Provides the CloudWatch log stream Amazon Resource Name (ARN) and the IAM role ARN. Note: To write application messages to CloudWatch, the IAM role that is used must have the PutLogEvents policy action enabled. ARN of the CloudWatch log to receive application messages. IAM ARN of the role to use to send application messages. Note: To write application messages to CloudWatch, the IAM role that is used must have the PutLogEvents policy action enabled.

nested_params.name: LogStreamARN
nested_params.description: ARN of the CloudWatch log to receive application messages.

nested_params.name: RoleARN
nested_params.description: IAM ARN of the role to use to send application messages. Note: To write application messages to CloudWatch, the IAM role that is used must have the PutLogEvents policy action enabled.
